-1.event_info: Initial trigger for miners to observe the global map state

1.event_info: Event triggered after observing the map, leads to action decision

2.event_info: Decision to occupy or maintain land ownership with energy investment

fields.name: energy_investment
fields.description: Amount of energy invested in occupying or maintaining land

fields.name: cell_coordinates
fields.description: Coordinates of the grid cell targeted for occupation or maintenance

fields.name: previous_owner
fields.description: Identifier of the previous owner of the land, if applicable

3.event_info: Decision to compete for land ownership with energy investment

fields.name: energy_investment
fields.description: Amount of energy invested in competing for land ownership

fields.name: cell_coordinates
fields.description: Coordinates of the grid cell targeted for competition

fields.name: current_owner
fields.description: Identifier of the current owner of the land being competed for

4.event_info: Successful ownership; proceed to resource exploitation

fields.name: new_owner
fields.description: Identifier of the agent now owning the land

fields.name: cell_coordinates
fields.description: Coordinates of the grid cell successfully occupied or maintained

5.event_info: Successful competition; proceed to resource exploitation

fields.name: new_owner
fields.description: Identifier of the agent who won the competition for land

fields.name: cell_coordinates
fields.description: Coordinates of the grid cell successfully competed for

fields.name: units_exploited
fields.description: Number of resource units exploited from the grid cell

fields.name: cell_coordinates
fields.description: Coordinates of the grid cell from which resources were exploited

fields.name: exploit_success
fields.description: Indicates whether resource exploitation was successful
